alert.note: Alert for Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:56PM CDT until May 06 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GOSPER COUNTY... At 556 PM CDT, a storm with a history of producing landspout tornadoes was located 8 miles south of Eustis, or 23 miles southwest of Lexington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspout tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public confirmed several touchdowns of a landspout tornado in Frontier County. IMPACT...Expect damage to mobile homes, roofs, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Elwood. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
